price: 47. Nabiyow Qaleela-le aroocak rubnaah kalia ayro keenih cusey: kaadu baaxo teetil teneemiy tet qellisak sugtek tu-teetil aneekal tet tableeh, gino inkih gaabosna cisab booxal, tokkel num keenik macabna.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلۡجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَارِزَةٗ وَحَشَرۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَمۡ نُغَادِرۡ مِنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma nusayyiru al-jibāla watarā al-arḍa bārizatan waḥasharnāhum falam nughādir min'hum aḥadan
